::Striker::

Striker sighs, lowering his head. He clenches his fists. This was pissing him 
off. Every couple of hours, there was an attack, and ussually a Maximal 
casualty. He looks at Spears, glancing at the Ark for a second.

"We need to go on the offencive. If they keep attacking here, we soon 
wouldn't stand a chance."

He looks at the Ark. "I think we should attack the Alliance or the Preds, 
give them something to repair while we work on the Ark."
